Name: The Beast In The Cave
About the game: This is an adventure plot game in the pixel style of kesulu. Follow the tourists described by Lovecraft to have an incredible Cave Adventure. In the depths of darkness, there are eyes staring at you In the game, you will play the leading role, enter a world unknown to human beings, solve the puzzles on various maps, escape from the claws of unknown creatures chasing you, and uncover the dark secrets hidden behind the fog. The ending of the story will vary according to your choice and behavior in the process, so in order to uncover the secret and live, you must concentrate +The plot of the game is based on Lovecraft's original short story beast in the cave +New short story games will be continuously updated according to the feedback +In game development +There is a demo that can be run +Put the beta on the shelves at the right time
